boshi.title: A reliable future based on experience
boshi.text: It Time is an academy of modern professions. We teach using the latest technologies and real projects with the help of experienced professionals. Our goal is to make you a highly paid IT specialist.

1.title: No money? - We have a solution!
1.text: If you donâ€™t have enough funds to attend the courses, donâ€™t worry. We will help you solve this problem.

2.title: Sell your knowledge successfully!
2.text: We not only provide knowledge but also help you market it successfully and start your career.

3.title: Quality education from top experts!
3.text: Our instructors are professionals with real industry experience.

4.title: Practice, real projects, and portfolio!
4.text: During the course, youâ€™ll work on real projects and build your portfolio.

5.title: Modern environment, free coworking & Wi-Fi
5.text: A comfortable, modern learning space, free coworking zone, and high-speed internet are at your service.

6.title: Certificate
6.text: Every student who successfully completes the course receives a certificate that meets international standards.

achiev.btitle: IT Time Academy - Learn the Professions of the Future
achiev.text: Our training center provides professional education in modern programming technologies, mobile graphics, and SMM. Through experienced teachers and practical projects, you will become a modern specialist.

jobs.title: Want to Get a Job?

1.text: Dive into the world of modern frontend development! Learn React, JavaScript and create amazing user interfaces with the help of experienced mentors.

2.title: Backend Development

mentors.title: Our Mentors
mentors.text: Experienced professionals who will help you achieve success

rustam.desc: With over ten years of development experience and five years of teaching, I have helped more than 500 students become professional developers. I have deep knowledge and practical experience in modern frontend technologies and programming methodologies.

gulbahor.desc: As an experienced teacher in graphic design, I approach teaching students modern design programs and technologies with great enthusiasm.

islom.desc: As an experienced teacher in Frontend development, I approach teaching students modern web technologies with great enthusiasm.

behruz.desc: As an experienced Frontend development teacher, I have extensive experience in teaching students modern web technologies.

dilshod.desc: As an experienced teacher in Python development and backend development, I have extensive experience in teaching students modern programming.
